SELECT row_number() over (order by b.board_time) as num ,b.board_number ,b.user_id ,b.title ,b.content ,b.board_time FROM board b WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND b.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
order by num desc
